roleset.name: to change residence, move from one place to another

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Kerr-McGee Corp. said [0] it will spend $ 42 million [*U*][*] to purchase land and relocate its ammonium perchlorate storage facility to Clark County , Nev. , from Henderson , Nev .

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Tuesday 's earthquake will depress local real-estate values in the short term and force companies to reconsider [*] expanding in [*RNR*]or relocating to [*RNR*] [the Bay Area and California] , real-estate and relocation specialists said [0] [*T*-3] .

example.name: medical example
example.text: left THA relocation under conscious sedation 4/10/00

example.name: Why args 2 and 3 may seem backwards
example.text: His relocation to Nevada from LA took place in 2006.

roleset.note: RELOCATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'relocate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'send', 'transfer'. (from relocate.01-v predicate notes)
RELOCATION-N NOTES: Based on Temprel data. Comparison to relocate.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie (from relocation.01-n)
